full_text: Incident Report CHEROKEE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE 498 CHATTIN DRIVE (678) 493-4200 06-6702 DRAFT Reported Date 01/21/2006 Nature of Call Officer ALLEN, AUTUMN Supplement No 0001 Administrative Information Agency CHEROKEE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE Report No 06-6702 Supplement No 0001 Reported Date 01/21/2006 Reported Time 15:30 Officer 000284/ALLEN, AUTUMN Assignment CID DAY SHIFT PERSONS UNIT Approving Officer Entered by 000284 Approval Time Narrative On 012106 I was notified by dispatch to give B-43 a call. I called and spoke with D/S Ballard and he was taking a report of a missing juvenile age 15. He stated she was supposed to have went to a basketball game last night but she didn't. He stated she went off with some black males. He told they were stopped by some white friends of her and they fought with the black males. D/S Ballard said the mother had contact with her daughter around 8:00 last night but had not heard from her since then. Report Officer 000284/ALLEN, AUTUMN Printed At 06/06/2006 11:12 Page 1 of 1 07/26/17 Page 37 of 131 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00030504

text_blocks.content: Incident Report CHEROKEE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE 498 CHATTIN DRIVE (678) 493-4200
06-6702 DRAFT Reported Date 01/21/2006 Nature of Call Officer ALLEN, AUTUMN

Narrative On 012106 I was notified by dispatch to give B-43 a call. I called and spoke with D/S Ballard and he was taking a report of a missing juvenile age 15. He stated she was supposed to have went to a basketball game last night but she didn't. He stated she went off with some black males. He told they were stopped by some white friends of her and they fought with the black males. D/S Ballard said the mother had contact with her daughter around 8:00 last night but had not heard from her since then.
Report Officer 000284/ALLEN, AUTUMN Printed At 06/06/2006 11:12 Page 1 of 1
07/26/17 Page 37 of 131 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00030504

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned incident report from the Cherokee County Sheriff's Office. The report is dated January 21, 2006, and was printed on June 6, 2006. The narrative section describes a missing juvenile case. The document has been stamped with a public records request number (17-295) and has a DOJ reference number (DOJ-OGR-00030504).
